about:
Hi there,

I am a french interactive developer living in Paris.
I have 8+ years experience in big ad agencies and small design studio in Paris and London.
I've been freelancing since November 2013.

I mainly work on front end for websites or apps.
I also enjoy experiment more tangible stuffs.

Feel free to have a look at my projects and experiments.

You can contact me at nico@nicolaspigelet.com.
